dc:description: Fragment of woven wool fabric with plied yellow warp and tapestry bands and shaded stripes as follows:
yellow slit tapestry and brown stripes                      6 cm
alternating yellow and brown slit tapestry              3.3 cm
brown shaded stripes with wool weft-wrapping    5.2 cm
There is as ribbed selvedge remnant present.  There is stitching along the selvedge edge and in the yellow slit tapestry section.
